document.full_text: louis oosthuizen missed the cut in his first two masters but winning last year's british open has given the south african a major jolt of confidence for his third appearance at augusta national.
document.title: oosthuizen empowered by british open memories
lines_and_colors: louis oosthuizen missed the cut in his first two masters but winning last year's british open has given the south african a major jolt of confidence for his third appearance at augusta national.
